name: Talk Block Chronicles
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 41 with the theme "combine 2 incompatible genres". It's tetris but in visual novelly form. You must talk to these blocks and go through their nonsense before they can be set in place!

What more can I say. This is weird but it was pretty fun to make and it also made me question the career path I have chosen. Take that as you will.
